sqlMap.select: select plan_no, titleImage,member_no, planName, memberName, message, to_char(planDate,'yyyy-mm-dd')as planDate from plan order by plan_no desc

select plan_no, titleImage,member_no, planName, memberName, message, to_char(planDate,'yyyy-mm-dd')as planDate from plan where TRUNC(planDate) = trunc(sysdate) and member_no=#member_no# order by plan_no desc
select plan_no, titleImage,member_no, titleImage, planName, memberName, message, to_char(planDate,'yyyy-mm-dd')as planDate from plan where plan_no=#plan_no#
select plan_no, titleImage,member_no, titleImage, planName, memberName, message, to_char(planDate,'yyyy-mm-dd')as planDate from plan where member_no=#member_no# order by plan_no desc
sqlMap.update: update plan set titleImage=#titleImage#, planName = #planName#, message = #message# where plan_no=#plan_no#
sqlMap.select: select b.* from (select * from follow where member_no = #member_no#) a, (select p.* from plan p, (select plan_no from contentbox where content_no = #content_no#) c where p.plan_no = c.plan_no) b where a.followName = b.memberName
SELECT * FROM (select rownum rnum,plan_no,member_no,titleImage,planName,memberName,message,planDate FROM (select * from plan order by plan_no asc)) WHERE rnum>=#startpage# AND rnum<=#endpage#
select count(*) as x from plan
